publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-560 Mr Mark Ruskell: Future of Scottish Agriculture-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to apply the Precautionary Principle and adopt the most legally restrictive policy, regardless of Her Majesty's Government's position, in relation to GM crops in recognition of the significant danger that they pose to GM-free conventional and organic farming and the potential risks to human health, animal health and the environment. Supported by: Shiona Baird*
